name: P10
prompt: Security camera footage from elevated doorbell camera, suburban home front porch at night. Single porch light provides harsh overhead illumination with deep shadows. A person in dark hoodie with hood pulled up completely obscuring face, head down. They walk steadily toward the front door from the edge of frame. Natural walking gait, arms swinging slightly. Fixed camera position, wide-angle lens with slight barrel distortion, fisheye edge distortion, IR-tinted footage quality typical of home security systems, slight grain. Realistic human motion, 15-second duration.
